articles.title: Why the Recent Massive Outflow of Capital Matters for India - The Wire
articles.description: Unlike previous episodes of sudden stops and reversals, the recent volume of outflows is much higher, and could accentuate financial vulnerabilities while worsening overall macroeconomic instability.
